frames.prompt: An extremely wide shot from space showcasing a serene, lush planet occupying the lower half of the frame. The top half is dominated by the dark silhouettes of the Silicate battleships hovering in a silent formation. The planet is gently lit on one side, casting a faint glow, while the battleships' underbellies reflect subtle white metallic glimmers, hinting at their advanced technology. The overall mood is one of a foreboding calm, emphasizing the enormous scale of the Silicate fleet against the tranquility of the planet below.
frames.negative_prompt: Avoid overly bright or saturated colors, overly clean or digital-looking textures, and thin or inconsistent linework.

frames.prompt: An extremely wide shot from the vantage point of space, capturing a serene, lush planet filling the lower half of the frame. The planet is gently lit by the system's sun, casting a faint glow on its surface, revealing patches of green and blue. Above, the dark silhouettes of the Silicate battleships form a silent, formidable formation. Their underbellies exhibit subtle white metallic glimmers, hinting at their advanced technology. The entire scene conveys a foreboding calm and emphasizes the enormous scale of the Silicate fleet hovering ominously against the backdrop of space.
frames.negative_prompt: Avoid overly bright or saturated colors, excessive detail that detracts from the main elements, and any modern or futuristic elements that do not fit the graphic novel/anime aesthetic.
